editorialNotes.standard: Airbnb has totally changed the way we find places to stay. The unique service is packed with amazing spots all around the worldfrom cottages in France to New York City condos. Book private rooms, share homes with a host or list your own space. This full-featured app boasts thousands of rent-ready pads, intuitive filters and a beautiful design.
editorialNotes.short: Unique properties and memorable experiences for an unforgettable trip.
Book flights, hotels and activities for your whole family.

editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteriesand you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether youre buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. Its easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.

editorialNotes.tagline: A fun way to learn a language
editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingos long been one of our favourite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.tagline: Load your card on Apple Watch
editorialNotes.standard: Weve had Starbucks super-handy app on our phones for ages, and its staying right there. The streamlined dashboard gives us quick access to features like rewards and gift cards. Plus, we can place an order at any of more than 7,700 company-owned stores nationwide and pay ahead of timeand when we arrive, its all ready to pick up.
editorialNotes.short: Get quick access to rewards and gift cards from a streamlined dashboard.
